Inspiration/Hard Drills in each Locale
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher 3 Archive (PS2): Miscellaneous Q&A (Post New Questions Here): Inspiration/Hard Drills in each Locale
By The D on Monday, June 24, 2002 - 10:14 am:

Ok I read the thread on the Kalaragi and how to get inspired to get the hard drills for each level, but is it true that you need to be a certain rank to find each of the drills? If so, can you just get an S-Class monster and find all of them if you have'nt found them? Are they like a story, where you have to find 3 in one Locale in order to find the ones in the next Locale?

I just need to know this because I only found 2 in Morx. This would help out in training my Hengar. Without these, I doubt I'll be able to Max him.

By Lisa Shock on Monday, June 24, 2002 - 10:58 am:

No one has proven anything about needing rank to find the hard drills.

By The D on Monday, June 24, 2002 - 01:42 pm:

Sorry about the dumb questions. I just got almost all of the hard drills. But just to note, I got the first two in each of the locations with a C-Class monster. The third one I did with an A/S-Class monster. Sorry about that. I could have figured it out without asking.

By Tararara on Wednesday, July 10, 2002 - 08:42 am:

Well, I can tell you that Real thing(takrama) and Life Risk(kalaragi) took me and my sister until high grades(dont remember how high) to get. It could be monster streingth or somethig else that goes up, because that more or less corusponds with the grade your in.

By The_zan on Thursday, August 1, 2002 - 05:18 am:

I couldn't get hit moles (Morx) until I had a grade A Momo.....

By Dracx Raiden Rancher on Thursday, December 4, 2003 - 07:54 pm:

From what I've seen posted here and a lil exp for myself I think that finding the extra training methods are somewhat random.

Though I think another determining factor is if you have a high enough stat for the given training place. I got "real thing"(int up and def up) on my S class int/speed suezo had 780's int and 760's spd. So I think each one has more determining factor when you have higher pnts for the training your trying to find during a venture along with random chance.

By Blackish_ on Sunday, April 15, 2007 - 09:08 pm:

I got Real Thing with a B-rank Pixie/Pixie with 400-500 Int.

I think it's as random as anything.
